sources.title: Dangerous Holiday
sources.description: A wealthy young boy that is heavily sheltered by his family runs away from home and gets into plenty of trouble on his way to manhood.

sources.title: Dangerous Holiday (1937) HEDDA HOPPER
sources.description:
Stars: Hedda Hopper, Guinn 'Big Boy' Williams, Ronald Sinclair
Director: Nicholas T. Barrows

A young violin prodigy is assumed kidnapped after he runs away from home.

sources.title: Dangerous Holiday (1937) Drama Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Ronnie is a child prodigy who enjoys playing the violin, and his relatives and agent want to exploit his talents so as to make more money off of him. Fed up with their intentions, Ronnie decides to take off on his own for a bit.

Director: Nicholas T. Barrows
Writers: Nicholas T. Barrows, Karen DeWolf
Stars: Ronald Sinclair, Guinn 'Big Boy' Williams, Hedda Hopper 
Genres: Drama
